Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.dao

Class UserDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.dao.UserDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDao
@Repository public class UserDaoImpl extends Object implements UserDao
Provides a JDBC-based implementation for user-related database operations. Implements the UserDao interface.
